Meals.Name: Hearty Stew
Meals.Description: A steaming bowl of rich, savory stew filled with tender meat and fresh vegetables. Perfect for warming you up after a long day of adventuring.

Meals.Name: Roasted Meat
Meals.Description: Juicy cuts of meat roasted to perfection, seasoned with fragrant herbs. A favorite among warriors and travelers alike.

Meals.Name: Refreshing Ale
Meals.Description: A frothy mug of golden ale that quenches your thirst and refreshes your spirit. Perfect for celebrating victories or easing the day’s stresses.

Meals.Name: Mystic Elixir
Meals.Description: A glowing potion brewed from rare herbs and magical ingredients. It has a unique taste that invigorates your senses.

Meals.Name: Baker’s Delight
Meals.Description: A sweet pastry filled with fruits and topped with honey. A delightful way to end your meal.

Meals.Name: Skip the Meal
Meals.Description: You decide not to order anything and prepare to leave.
